statements: UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_inventory SET price = 25.99 WHERE item_name = 'Sword';
UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE item_type = 'Potion';
UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
UPDATE game_inventory SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_type = 'armor';
UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 0.9 WHERE item_type = 'consumable';
